metadata.name: OffsetAlign1_0
metadata.description:
OffsetAlign is an audiovisual thing I made inspired by blueprints and exploded diagrams.

It’s part interactive generative art system and part music performance… but was mainly an excuse to use my drums and synths to make some complex patterns from simple geometry in real time.

This is the performance that produced the 5 other stills in this collection.

[1080 x 1920] MP4 
More info at brettbolton.net/offsetalign
